title: "Having Regard To The Object Of The A&C Act, The Delay Of 435 Days In Filing An Appeal Is Too Long To Exercise Discretion: Telangana High Court"
excerpt: "The Telangana High Court has held that having regards to the object of the A&C Act, the delay of 435 days in filing an appeal is too long to exercise discretion. The Division Bench"
